con:config.con:query: Select Top 30 a.shopper_id As a_shopper_id, a.login_user_name As a_login_user_name, a.brand_code As a_brand_code, a.login_hint_question_text As a_login_hint_question_text, a.reservation_user_id As a_reservation_user_id, b.creation_user_id As b_creation_user_id, b.consumer_id As b_consumer_id, b.loyalty_nbr As b_loyalty_nbr From SHOPPER_LOGIN a Inner Join SHOPPER b On a.shopper_id = b.shopper_id And b.logical_delete_flag = 0 And a.brand_code = '${#TestCase#brand}' Order By a.creation_dtm
